data.eml:eml: New species of reed frog from the Congo basin with discussion of paraphyly in Cinnamon-belly reed frogs

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Schick, Susanne, Kielgast, Jos, Rödder, Dennis, Muchai, Vincent, Burger, Marius, Lötters, Stefan (2010): New species of reed frog from the Congo basin with discussion of paraphyly in Cinnamon-belly reed frogs. Zootaxa 2501: 23-36, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.195830
